front.title: The Use of DSS within ESP and AH

abstract.t: This memo describes the use of DSS [FIPS-186] in as anauthentication mechanism within the IPSEC Encapsulating SecurityPayload [ESP] and the IPSEC Authentication Header [AH]. DSS providesdata origin authentication and integrity protection.DSS authenticated ESP or AH can be used with the Host IdentityPayload [HIP99]. Further information on the other componentsnecessary for ESP and AH implementations is provided by [Thayer97a].
